altTitles.ja: とある暗部の少女共棲

description.en:
In Academy City, where esper abilities have been recognized as a general science. Behind the peace, there is a dark side organization that undertakes missions that cannot be made public.

"Item" is an elite unit consisting of four girls. Takitsubo Rikou is able to read and track the weak power emitted by those with abilities. Frenda Seivelun, who excels in combat using explosives and traps. Kinuhata Saiai, who can manipulate nitrogen at will and plays a defensive role. And one of the 7 espers that Academy City is proud of: Mugino Shizuri. They live freely in the darkness of the Academy City, and quietly set their sights on their target...!

This is a story of encounter, friendship, and darkness that eventually leads to a 'terrible incident'!

description.en: The prequel to the series [Jaa, Kimi no Kawari ni Korosou ka?].  The main character this time is Kumaoka Aizen (Ameli's younger half-brother who appears in chapter 22 of the main story), the son of a yakuza boss.  The story takes place during Aizen's middle school years and this section focuses on describing the personality changes of Aizen and the other half-siblings that Aizen has met.
description.vi: Phần tiền truyện của bộ Jaa, Kimi no Kawari ni Korosou ka? . Nhân vật chính lần này là Kumaoka Aizen (em trai cùng cha khác mẹ của Ameri xuất hiện ở chap 22 trong chính truyện), con trai của lão đại yakuza. Câu chuyện diễn ra vào hồi cấp 2 của Aizen và phần này tập trung miêu tả quá trình thay đổi nhân cách của Aizen và những anh em cùng cha khác mẹ khác mà Aizen đã gặp.

description.en:
Rin Ishikawa, 16 years old, the "talent'' that will revolutionize the boxing world has begun to awaken in the north.

Rin is a very popular and mischievous person. He was raised by his mother and grandparents in a small town in Hokkaido.

Now, he has dropped out of high school and is about to embark on his journey.
Without thiniking about his future, he decide to go to Tokyo. 

Rin, little did he know that he would leave his name in the history of boxing.

altTitles.ja-ro: バケモノのきみに告ぐ

description.en:
In the walled city of Baldium, certain individuals develop supernatural abilities known as Unlaw—powers born from emotional trauma and mental anguish. Norman, a young man with an impressive track record of resolving mysterious cases involving these Unlaw, should have been celebrating his successes. Instead, he finds himself trapped in a dark interrogation room, forced to recount every case he’s handled—especially those involving four extraordinary girls who became his closest allies: the Teardrop, the Witch’s Hound, the Gemstone, and the Fairy.

Labeled as “Monsters” by society, these girls were feared and shunned—but to Norman, they were far more than their abilities. As he revisits their stories, he unravels the tangled web of love, trust, and sacrifice that bound their fates together.

This is a tale of confessions—to the world, to each other, and to the monsters within themselves.

description.en:
She possessed a villainess who is known and hated for her evil acts in an unpopular novel. But because of her personality, it was extremely difficult for her to play the villainess role. But not for long…

“I’ll fix your dress according to your taste this instant!”

“My request.”

“O-Of course! As per your request, there’s only one piece available in the whole Empire.”

People around me listen to me well even if I just frown and sit still. Since I don’t have to live in difficulty, I decided to just comfortably live on as a villainess.

“Father. Is it necessary for you to solve formulas in this slow and inefficient way?”

I thought it would be good to be a rich villainess, so I used all my knowledge.

“Why don’t you give me the honor of escorting the Princess?”

I have had enough of dealing with my father, so why did an unexpected character suddenly appear? What if this person disrupts my plan?

---
Dohee lived as a pushover, died miserably, and was reborn in a novel as a notorious villainess. But it turns out that her new life is not without its perks, as Deborah Seymour is also the richest villain alive. Now, all that's left for her to do is lay low and enjoy her carefree lifestyle...if not for the fact that Deborah is fated to be sent to a monastery! Will this ex-doormat find a way to avoid yet another tragic ending, or will the challenges of being a villainess be too much for her?

---

description.fr:
Dohee a vécu comme une poule mouillée, a péri misérablement et a été réincarnée dans un roman en tant que vilaine notoire. Mais il s'avère que sa nouvelle vie n'est pas sans avantages, car Deborah Seymour est aussi la méchante la plus riche de l'Empire. Il ne lui reste plus qu'à faire profil bas et à profiter de son insouciance... Si ce n'est que Deborah est condamnée à être envoyée dans un monastère! Cette ancienne fainéante trouvera-t-elle un moyen d'éviter une nouvelle fin tragique, ou les défis d'une méchante seront-ils trop importants pour elle?

description.hr:
Yoon Dohee, studentica arhitektonskog fakulteta, otkriva da ju njezine kolege i obitelj iskorištavaju za novac i kao besplatnu radnu snagu točno prije nego pogine u prometnoj nesreći.
Umjesto da zapravo umre ona se reinkarnira u ljubavni roman koji je nedavno čitala, ali ne kao glavni lik, nego kao glavni zlikovac i antagonist knjige Deborah Seymour.
Sada kao Deborah ona navigira novi život odmarajući se u bogatstu i raskoši, ali mora biti na oprezu jer je njezina reputacija duboko pod zemljom, a lik Debore u originalnoj knjizi završava svoju priču u tamnici.
description.id:
Kehidupan Yoon Dohee, wanita naif yang kerap dimanfaatkan oleh orang sekitarnya berubah drastis. Setelah dia mengalami kecelakaan dan sekarat, dia merasuk ke dalam tubuh wanita jahat bernama Deborah Seymour. Deborah Seymour adalah seorang tokoh di novel reverse harem rating 19+ berjudul 'A Dark Thorn Through My Throat'. Karena tidak ingin ada orang lain yang tahu kalau sebenarnya Yoon Dohee adalah wanita naif, dia akhirnya belajar untuk menjadi jahat seperti Deborah Seymour. "Aku tidak akan hidup sebagai orang yang baik dan menyedihkan seperti di masa lalu. Aku akan terus hidup enak sebagai wanita jahat!"

description.uk:
Ду Хі опанувала тіло лиходійки одного непопулярного роману, яка була відома і ненависна всім за свої погані вчинки. Але через власний характер їй дуже важко правильно грати роль злодійки. Але ненадовго.. 

"Я зміню сукню згідно з вашим смаком негайно" 

"Моє прохання." 

"З-звісно! Згідно з вашим запитом, у всій імперії є лише одна річ." 

Люди навколо мене добре слухають, навіть якщо я просто хмурюсь і сиджу на місці. Оскільки мені не доводиться жити в труднощах, я вирішила просто комфортно жити у тілі лиходійки. 

«Батько, чи потрібно вам розв’язувати формули таким повільним і неефективним способом?» 

Я подумала, що було б добре бути багатою негідницею, тому використовувала усі свої знання. 

«Чому б вам не надати мені честь супроводжувати принцесу?» 

У мене досить багато справ з батьком, так чому раптом з’явився цей неочікуваний персонаж? Що, якщо ця людина спробує порушити мій план?

---

altTitles.en: I'm Looking for a New Husband

description.en:
Riat, caught up in her husband's treason, faces death.

After repeatedly returning to the past at the cost of half her lifespan, she finally breaks the cycle by offering her husband’s head to the emperor.

With only 1 year and 3 months left to live, her one wish is—

"I’m going to fall in love."

At last, an announcement spreads across the entire empire: a competition to find Riat’s new husband, with a grand prize of 1 billion gold.

Candidates begin to flood in, but suspicious figures also start gathering around her…

title.en: The Café Terrace and Its Goddesses

altTitles.ja: 女神のカフェテラス

description.en:
Kasukabe Hayato has been accepted to Tokyo U on his first try. Receiving news of his grandmother's death, he returns to his childhood home, Cafe Terrace Familia, for the first time in three years to find five strange girls there who claim to be "Grandma's Family"! Hayato's unexpected life in a seaside town with these five girls of fate begins here!
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10009/episode/319474) (U.S. Only)
description.ja: 東大現役合格の秀才・粕壁 隼。ケンカ別れしていた祖母の訃報を聞いて、3年ぶりに海辺の町の古びた実家「カフェテラス・ファミリア」に帰ると、そこには見知らぬ５人の女の子が！ しかも彼女たちは「おばあちゃんの家族」を名乗り…!? 運命の女×５との贅沢すぎる共同生活が始まるっ！『涼風』『君町』『風夏』の瀬尾公治が描く一つ屋根の下ハーレム！ どの娘に恋する？どの娘を愛でる？
description.ru: Спустя три года, после ссоры со своей бабушкой, Хаято Касукабэ возвращается в свой родной дом в котором поселилось пять девушек. Выясняется, что бабушка Хаято позволила девушкам жить в этом доме, а те заботились о ней до самой её смерти. Так начинается история Хаято и пяти "Богинь".
description.vi: Kasukabe Hayato đã được nhận vào Đại Học Tokyo ngay trong lần thi đầu tiên. Nhưng sau khi nhận được tin bà nội qua đời, anh trở về ngôi nhà thời thơ ấu của mình, quán cà phê Familia.  Và thấy 5 cô gái lạ mặt tự xưng là "Gia đình của bà"! Cuộc sống mới của Hayato tại một thị trấn ven biển với năm cô gái định mệnh bắt đầu từ đây!

description.ar: تسو تيانشين هو آخر إنسان حي في مدينة مليئة بالزومبي. فقط عندما كان متأكداً من أنه مات ، يجد روحه تعود إلى ما قبل ذلك اليوم المشؤوم قبل عشر سنوات. يقسم أنه سوف يحمي الناس المهمين له هذه المرة ويجتمع مع عشيقته. تابعوا نضاله من أجل البقاء بمساعدة ذكرياته للسنوات العشر القادمة!
description.en: Zuo Tianchen is the last living human in a mutated zombie-infested city. Just when he was sure he'd died, he finds his soul returned to just before that ill-fated day ten years ago. He swears he'll protect the people important to him this time round and reunite with his past lover. Watch his struggles to survive equipped with his memory of the next ten years!
description.fr: uo Tianchen est l'un des derniers survivants sur terre depuis qu'une épidémie venant de l'espace s'était abattue sur terre, il l'y a de cela 10 ans. Alors qu'il est sur le point de mourir, Zuo fît donc ses adieux à sa petite amie qu'il avait rencontré durant l'épidémie. C'est alors que, d'un coup, alors qu'il était sur le point de mourir, il retourna dans le temps 10 ans auparavant, quelques heures avant le début de l'épidémie. C'est alors qu'il décida de sauver son meilleur ami qui avait périt dès le début de l'épidémie, 10 ans auparavant, et c'est alors qu'il se met à la recherche de sa copine qu'il avait dans l'ancienne apocalypse.
description.ru:
Зе Тянчен – последний выживший человек в городе, зараженном зомби-инфекцией. Будучи на грани смерти, он внезапно оказался в своем теле десять лет назад, когда город еще не был заражен. Он решил, что в этот раз спасет близких ему людей и воссоединится со своей старой любовью.   
  
Следите за его приключениями, в которых он использует свои воспоминания о следующих 10 годах, чтобы выжить и спасти своих близких!

description.en: Kamine Shouta is a boy who is able to "see" people's hearts, though the ability has caused him to distance himself from people. His meeting with saxophone player Tokisaka Hibiki changes both of them for the better, and Tokisaka convinces Kamine to join the school concert band. Now Kamine, who knows nothing about music, will have to use his ability to win over the band's section leaders in the hopes of leading the band to the national competition next year… as its conductor!

description.en: On a rainy summer evening, a woman and a "dog" happened to meet each other and life has never been the same since.
description.ja: 雨の降る日に、１人と１匹は出会いました。“あともうちょっと”がほっこり尊いと話題です。
description.ru: В один дождливый день она подобрала что-то похожее на собаку... Давайте же посмотрим, насколько хитрой может быть эта "собака"...
description.pt-br: Em uma noite chuvosa de verão, uma mulher e um "cachorro" se conheceram e a vida nunca mais foi a mesma desde então.

A story about being followed around by a girl who appears to be just a hallucination.

---

Note: The original web comic that was released on on Twitter and Pixiv has been compiled on Amazon into 1 ebook volume titled Genkaku Shoujo ga Tsukimatou (幻覚少女がつきまとう) "A Hallucinatory Girl Follows Me Around" and released on March 25, 2024.

* Alternate Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/116706658)

altTitles.ja: 亜人シェアハウス

description.en:
The communicative, corporate animal Kei Sato applies to move into a share house in order to make friends with whom he can have casual conversations. The three people there were Chiyuki Himiiyama (Snow Woman), Meme Janome (Medusa) and Melodrama Incuria (Incubus). This was a share house exclusively for subhumans, who were supposed to be invisible to humans...

The share house life begins with a lot of difficulties ahead!

(Source: Mangaupdates)

title.en: It's Over! Empress' Husband Is Actually Invincible

altTitles.zh: 完了啊！女帝的软饭丈夫居然无敌

altTitles.zh-ro: Wanliao Ah! Nvdi De Ruan Fan Zhangfu Juran Wudi

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

altTitles.ja: 夜桜さんちの大作戦

altTitles.es-la: La Misión de la Familia Yozakura

altTitles.vi: Nhiệm vụ tối thượng nhà Yozakura

description.en:
Taiyo Asano is a super shy high school student and the only person he can talk to is his childhood friend, Mutsumi Yozakura. It turns out that Mutsumi is the daughter of the ultimate spy family! Even worse, Mutsumi is being harassed by her overprotective, nightmare of a brother, Kyoichiro. What drastic steps will Taiyo have to take to save Mutsumi?!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Mission: Yozakura Family** (2023)
- [English volumes (Viz Media)](https://www.viz.com/mission-yozakura-family)
description.es:
Taiyo Asano es un estudiante de secundaria súper tímido y la única persona con la que puede hablar es su amiga de la infancia, Mutsumi Yozakura. ¡Resulta que Mutsumi es la hija de una última familia de espías! Peor aún, Mutsumi está siendo acosada por su sobreprotector hermano, Kyoichiro. ¿Qué decisión tendrá que tomar Taiyo para salvar a Mutsumi? Una comedia familiar de espías: ¡Comienza la misión!

---
Publicado en Español por [Norma Editorial](https://www.normaeditorial.com/catalogo/manga/serie/mision-familia-yozakura) como "Misión: Familia Yozakura" (2022)
description.fr:
Afin de protéger Mutsumi et de découvrir la véritable raison de la mort de ses parents, Taiyo Asano va devoir devenir membre de la famille Yozakura, une famille d’espions de haut vol ! Parviendra-t-il à survivre à ce quotidien plein de dangers pour, cette fois, réussir à protéger ceux qui lui sont chers ?

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.it: Taiyo Asano è un timidissimo studente delle superiori e l'unica persona a cui può parlare è la sua amica d'infanzia, Mutsumi Yozakura. Si scopre che Mutsumi è la figlia della suprema famiglia di spie! Ancora peggio, Mustumi viene tormentata dal suo fratello iperprotettivo, Kyoichiro. Quale tragico destino Taiyo dovrà affrontare per salvare Mustumi?! Una commedia su una famiglia di spie - la missione avrà inizio!||
description.ja: 超人見知りの高校生･朝野太陽が話せるのは、幼なじみの夜桜六美ただ一人。けれど六美は代々続くスパイ一家の娘で、極度のシスコンの兄が太陽排除に動き出した！　自らと六美を守るため太陽がとった手段とは!?
description.es-la: Taiyo Asano es un estudiante de secundaria súper tímido y la única persona con la que puede hablar es su amiga de la infancia, Mutsumi Yozakura. ¡Resulta que Mutsumi es la hija de una última familia de espías! Peor aún, Mutsumi está siendo acosada por su sobreprotector hermano, Kyoichiro. ¿Qué decisión tendrá que tomar Taiyo para salvar a Mutsumi? Una comedia familiar de espías: ¡Comienza la misión!
description.pt-br: Taiyo Asano é um estudante super tímido do ensino médio e a única pessoa com quem ele consegue conversar é sua amiga de infância, Mutsumi Yozakura. Acontece que Mutsumi é a filha da melhor família de espiões! Pior ainda, Mutsumi está sendo assediada por seu super-protetor, o pesadelo de um irmão, Kyoichiro. Que passos drásticos Taiyo terá que tomar para salvar Mutsumi? Uma comédia familiar de espiões – a missão começa!

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

title.en: I want to NTR the loser heroine

altTitles.ja: 負けヒロインをNTRしたい

altTitles.id: Aku ingin meng-NTR heroine yang kalah.

altTitles.vi: Đứng Núi Này Trông Núi Nọ

altTitles.ja: 妄想ショウジョ

description.en: At first sight Jun seems like a hot vamp, however her sexy look is a complete lie. In reality she is a very shy wallflower. But what's even worse: She is still a virgin! In desperation, she seeks refuge in her erotic daydreams which always turn into some odd situations. And if that wasn't enough, she also finds out that the man of her dreams lives nearby.
description.fr:
À première vue, Jun ressemble à une bimbo, mais son look sexy est un mensonge complet. En réalité, elle est très timide.  
Pire encore pour elle : elle est encore vierge!  
En désespoir de cause, elle cherche refuge dans ses rêveries érotiques qui arrivent toujours sans qu'elle s'y attende.  
Et si cela ne suffisait pas, elle constate également que l'homme de ses rêves vit à proximité.
description.ja: 男漁りしてる？クラブに入り浸り？バイトはキャバ？大胆な露出＆やたら明るい巻き髪＆派手なネイルと派手なメイク。周りからは完全にビッチと思われているジュンだが、実は処女でしかも重度の妄想癖。そんな彼女が、バイト先のコンビニで出逢った客に一目ボレ。果たしてジュンは妄想＆処女から卒業出来るのか――!?

altTitles.ja: 可愛原先輩はかわいいがすき！

description.en:
Saotome-kun is short and terrible at sports. He thought that studying was his only good point, but in his new high school, his grades are a far cry from stellar. As he was feeling down and thinking he had nothing, the academically brilliant, sporty, elegant, and beautiful "Perfect Student Council President" Kawaibara-senpai approached him.
Having maintained her position at the top of the grade since she enrolled, she offers to tutor Saotome on one condition: he must wear a sailor uniform while studying with her. Their secret study sessions after school begin...
description.ja: 同作の主人公・早乙女くんは、背が小さく運動も苦手で、勉強だけが自分の取り柄だと考えていたが、入学した高校ではその勉強でもトップには程遠く、「自分にはなにもない」と落ち込んでいた。そんな早乙女に声をかけたのは、文武両道、容姿端麗な“完璧生徒会長”の可愛原（かわいばら）先輩。入試以来学年首席を守り続けている彼女は、早乙女に「特別に勉強を教えてあげてもいい」と提案する。しかしその条件として、自分と勉強しているときはセーラー服を着てほしいと女装を強要してきて……。放課後、秘密の勉強会が始まる。

altTitles.ja: 凍堂くんちのメイドショタ

description.en:
Rennosuke, a scion of the influential Toudou Group, has a terrible relationship with his family. He spends his days getting told off by his father and older sister, who say things like "Did you get into a fight again?" "Having a delinquent for a son of the Toudou family is an embarrassment". 
One day, Rennosuke chances upon a hungry child. The sight of that child hungrily devouring a piece of bread reminds Rennosuke of the dog he once owned, and he asks half-jokingly "If you don't have anywhere to go, why don't you come to my place?".  The child then comes to the Toudou house and starts working as a maid.

altTitles.ja: ズバ蛮

description.en: It is the Sengoku period. ZubaBan is a wild child who is unbeatable in physical strength, he can easily swing around his giant sword and cut down hordes of enemies! Then, suddenly, Jeanne d'Arc, a knight clad in western armor appears, along with Kanchohi, who came from China (?), and the invincible warrior Golongo. This colorful punch joins forces in hopes of uniting Japan! Zubaban is unbeatable in hand-to-hand combat, but soon the gears of strange fate turn...!? A thrilling, super-period drama depicted on a grand scale!

Walking aimlessly through the ruins of civilization, life had never been better for Lya and Renard. In their world filled with rubble and rain, a faint streak of sunshine can light the darkest streets. Side by side, in search of food, they embark on an endless journey towards the center of the city. Sharing both the warm and cold, the siblings rediscover the disintegrating remnants of humanity.

altTitles.ja: あやかしトライアングル

description.en:
Ever since he was a boy, Matsuri Kazamaki has worked as an exorcist. Because his childhood friend Suzu Kanade attracts malicious spirits called ayakashi like moths to a flame, Matsuri is tasked with slaying any with ill intentions.   
  
One day, an ayakashi named Shirogane notices the budding romance between these two childhood friends. Eager to both devour Suzu and foil Matsuri’s chance at love, he performs a forbidden spell…  
  
The newest series by Kentaro Yabuki, creator of Black Cat and artist behind To Love Ru and Darling in the Franxx.
Visit the official [website](https://www.shonenjump.com/j/rensai/ayakashi.html) for latest news! English Volume release [licensed](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/ayakashi-triangle/) by Seven Seas.
description.fr: Depuis son enfance, Matsuri Kazamaki travaille comme exorciste. Parce que son ami d'enfance Suzu Kanade attire à une flamme des esprits malveillants appelés ayakashi comme des papillons de nuit, Matsuri est chargé de tuer tous ceux qui ont de mauvaises intentions. Un jour, un ayakashi nommé Shirogane remarque la romance naissante entre ces deux amis d'enfance. Désireux à la fois de dévorer Suzu et de déjouer les chances de Matsuri de s'aimer, il exécute un sort interdit…
description.it: Il Giappone sembra invaso da misteriosi mostri chiamati Ayakashi, ma a contrastare la minaccia esiste una forza speciale, i ninja esorcisti! Il giovane ninja esorcista Matsuri passa le giornate a combatterli e a proteggere la sua amica d'infanzia Suzu. Quando appare un ayakashi chiamato Shirogane, le cose si stravolgono! Kentaro Yabuki torna su Shonen Jump con una nuova serie fantasy, ricca di ayakashi e romanticismo!
description.ru:
Японию начали наводнять таинственные монстры — Аякаси. Ниндзя-экзорцист по имени Мацури неустанно борется с ними изо дня в день, чтобы уберечь себя и свою подругу детства Сузу. Однако, после появления кота-аякаси по имени Широганэ, всё переворачивается с ног на голову!  
Сможет ли наш отважный герой справиться с возникшей напастью? С этого и начинается наше приключение от всеми известного мангаки Кэнтаро Ябуки, который вернулся в Джамп со своей новой фэнтези историей с привкусом романтики!
description.pt-br:
Desde menino, Matsuri Kazamaki trabalha como exorcista.  Porque seu amigo de infância Suzu Kanade atrai espíritos maliciosos chamados ayakashi como mariposas para uma chama, Matsuri é encarregado de matar qualquer um com más intenções.
  
Um dia, um ayakashi chamado Shirogane percebe o romance entre esses dois amigos de infância.  Ansioso para devorar Suzu e frustrar a chance de amor de Matsuri, ele realiza um feitiço proibido…
  
|| A mais nova série de Kentaro Yabuki, criador de Black Cat e artista por trás de To Love Ru e Darling in the Franxx. ||

description.en: Sadai, looking for a place to die, headed deep into the mountains. There he encountered a mysterious and gentle girl who had lived alone in an abandoned village for 150 years, continuing to serve an intangible god. A man that had failed to die and a widow with a graceful aura — from the remains of their wasted lives, the two of them begin a new chapter of their story.

description.en:
I enrolled in a prestigious girls academy, even though I'm actually a crossdressing boy?! But, in my class lies a secret as well...?

This prestigious school, St. Aster Girls Academy, is where I am entering as a first year. Unexpectedly, I had to crossdress in order to enroll! If my roommate or classmates found out I am a guy, it would be inexcusable!

description.en:
A man is entwined and captured by a glamorous yet bizarre, deep-seated terror.

The gears of a young man with a promising future go a little out of order when he meets a certain woman. The genius Yoko Kondo vividly visualizes the decadent ghost stories recorded in the masterpiece collection of ghost stories "Kurameshu" by Kotaro Tanaka, the master of ghost story literature.

Damals hatte Dokja noch überhaupt keine Ahnung. Er hatte keine Ahnung, dass sein Lieblings-Web-Roman ‘Drei Wege um die Apokalypse zu überleben’ Realität wird und dass er der einzige ist, der weiß wie der Weltuntergang aussehen wird. Er hatte auch keine Ahnung, dass er letztendlich der Protagonist von diesem Roman werden würde. Jetzt begibt sich Dokja auf eine Reise, um den Lauf der Geschichte zu ändern und die Menschheit zu retten!

description.en: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
description.es:
En ese entonces, Dokja no tenía idea de que su novela web favorita, Tres maneras de sobrevivir al apocalipsis, cobraría vida y que solo él sabría cómo iba a terminar el mundo. Tampoco tenía idea de que se convertiría en el protagonista de esta novela transformada en realidad. Ahora Dokja debe embarcarse en un viaje para alterar el curso de la historia y salvar a la humanidad de una vez por todas.

description.ja:
「ありえない...これは俺が知っている展開だ。」 10年以上読み続けた小説の最終話を読んだ日、世界は滅亡し小説の世界が現実となった。 平凡で冴えないサラリーマンの主人公・ドクシャ。 そんな彼の趣味はWEB小説『滅亡した世界で生き残る３つの方法』を読むこと。 ついに最終話を読み終えたかと思いきや、作者からのメッセージが届き小説のモンスターと登場人物が突如現れ、新たな世界が幕を開けた！ 「俺は、この世界の結末を知る唯一の読者となった。」 たった一人だけが読み終えたファンタジー小説が現実に。 果たしてドクシャは滅亡した世界を救うことができるのか？

description.en:
Gekko Iwasaki, a high-school student, is selected as executor of "Moonlight Ordinance" and fights against the residents. In this fairy tale, there is a world which is strangely affected by blue moonlight once in dozens of years. "Moonlight Ordinance" is a rule to restore the world to its former condition.   
  
**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/ufujitakazuhiro?lang=ja)

altTitles.ja: INNU-イッヌ-

description.en:
Violent Action Comedy about a talking stray pug who's waiting for someone to pick him up from the streets. He happens to save a young woman from rape & abduction and the girl agrees to take him in aftwards. As it turns out, she's not a normal girl but a yakuza clan daughter. Luckily, the pug isn't a regular dog either, but a super strong badass fighter.  

(Synopsis by Manga Mogura)
description.vi: Câu chuyện mở đầu với một chú Pug nhỏ bị bỏ rơi bên bờ sông Sumida, Asakura, Tokyo. Thật may mắn thay, em cún đã được một cô nữ sinh tên Sally nhận nuôi và đặt tên là Innu. Nhưng sự thật, em cún Pug này là không những biết nói mà còn là chú chó mạnh nhất. Trước khi được nhận nuôi, Innu đã hứa với cô chủ của mình rằng sẽ sống như một con chó bình thường. Tuy nhiên Sally lại là con gái của một trùm xã hội đen với hàng tá mối nguy hiểm rình rập xung quanh cô. Vậy là cuộc sống mới với đầy những biến động của cô chủ Sally và chú chó Innu chính thức bắt đầu từ đây.

title.en: My Dearest Self With Malice Aforethought

altTitles.ru: Мое дорогое Я со злым умыслом

altTitles.ja-ro: Shinai naru Boku e Satsui o Komete

altTitles.ja: 親愛なる僕へ殺意をこめて

description.de:
Auf den ersten Blick scheint Eiji ein ganz normaler Student zu sein, doch er hat ein Geheimnis: sein verstorbener Vater war ein berüchtigter Serienmörder, der für seine extreme Grausamkeit bekannt war.
Eines Tages wacht Eiji neben einem schönen fremden Mädchen auf, das anscheinend in ihn verliebt ist und behauptet, seine Freundin zu sein, doch eigenartigerweise kann er sich nicht an sie erinnern. Die letzten Tage scheinen wie aus seinem Gedächtnis gelöscht, und es fühlt sich an, als hätte jemand anders die Kontrolle übernommen. Zur selben Zeit findet die örtliche Polizei eine aufs Übelste verstümmelte Leiche, und für sie besteht kein Zweifel: Eijis Vater ist zurück... doch kann das wirklich sein?
description.en: Urashima Eiji, a college student, goes to sleep after a fun drinking night with his friends. When he wakes up he discovers a beautiful girl next to him who treats him as if they are in a loving relationship. Later, Eiji finds out that 4 days have passed since he went out with his crew. What did he do during all that time and why does he have no memory of it? By confronting that reality, he will be caught in tragedy…
description.ne: एइजी, कलेज उमेरको कुमारले कुनै दिन प्रेमिका हुने सपना देख्छ... अनि एक दिन आफ्नो "प्रेमिका" को साथ आफ्नो ओछ्यानमा उठ्छ! त्यति मात्र होइन, उसको साथीले उसलाई बताउँछ कि ऊ झगडामा परेको छ ... र त्यो तीन दिन बितिसक्यो जुन एइजीलाई याद छैन? के अँध्यारो रहस्यहरू लुकाइरहेका छ ... एइजी आफैले?
description.ru:
Урашима Эйджи, студент колледжа, засыпает после веселой ночи с друзьями. Когда он просыпается, он обнаруживает рядом с собой красивую девушку, которая ведет себя с ним, как со своим парнем. Позже Эйджи узнает, что с того вечера прошло 3 дня. Что он делал все это время и почему не помнит ничего об этом? Столкнувшись с реальностью, он попадет в трагедию…  
  
Itou Shouta's Twitter: [@shota\_itooooo](https://twitter.com/shota_itooooo)
description.vi: Urashima Eiji, một sinh viên đại học, đi ngủ sau một đêm uống rượu vui vẻ với bạn bè. Khi tỉnh dậy, anh phát hiện ra một cô gái xinh đẹp bên cạnh, người đối xử với anh như thể họ đang trong một mối quan hệ yêu đương. Sau đó, anh phát hiện ra rằng 4 ngày đã trôi qua kể từ khi anh đi ra ngoài cùng với đám bạn của mình. Anh ấy đã làm gì trong suốt thời gian đó và tại sao anh ấy không có ký ức về nó?. Khi đối mặt với thực tế đó, anh sẽ bị cuốn vào bi kịch...

description.en: The trials and tribulations of a single father, who one day meets the reincarnation of his deceased wife, who perished a decade before.
description.es:
Las pruebas y adversidades de un padre soltero, que un día se encuentra con la reencarnación de su difunta esposa, que murió una década antes.  
  


---

Links  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/yayu_murata)
description.es-la: Nijima Keisuke es un hombre asalariado, vivía felizmente junto a su esposa y a su hija, hasta que un día su esposa fallece y él se derrumba. Siendo ahora un padre soltero, tuvo que esforzarse más por su hija pero perdía el camino y su estilo de vida se volvió muy deplorable, hasta que un día aparece una niña diciendo ser la reencarnación de su esposa y se propone ayudarlo para cambiar y corregir su lamentable situación actual.
description.pt-br: As provações e tribulações de um pai solteiro, que um dia encontra a reencarnação de sua falecida esposa.

altTitles.ja: Ｓランクパーティから解雇された【呪具師】～『呪いのアイテム』しか作れませんが、その性能はアーティファクト級なり……！～

altTitles.en: I'm a Curse Crafter, and I Don't Need an S-Rank Party!
My S-Rank Party Fired Me for Being a Cursificer: I Can Only Make “Cursed Items”, but They're Artifact Class!

altTitles.vi: Chỉ biết chế tạo trang bị nguyền rủa, tôi bị đuổi khỏi tổ đội cấp S

description.en:
Gaile, a Cursificer, is left penniless when he's expelled from his party as soon as they reach S Rank. Apparently he wasn't contributing enough?! But they hadn't realized that his cursed items outperform even holy relics and legendary equipment!

Gaile decides to try to make a living on his own off of his cursed items.
description.ja:
【呪具師】のゲイルは大して貢献していないと、パーティがＳランクに昇格したと同時に無一文で追い出される。しかし、彼らは理解していなかった。ゲイルの作る呪具は、そこらの聖遺物や勇者の装備をも凌駕する性能を誇っていたことに…。ゲイルは呪具を活かして一人で生きていこうと決意しーー。

風変わりな職業・呪具師の大活躍が新感覚の爽快感で大反響!!
description.vi: Gaile, một nguyền cụ sư tài năng, đã bị các đồng đội phản bội khi tổ đội đạt được hạng S. Họ không ngờ ràng các nguyền cụ của anh ta còn mạnh hơn cả thánh tích và các trang bị thần thoại. Sau khi bị đuổi khỏi tổ đội, Gaile quyết định tự mình kiếm sống bằng những nguyền cụ do mình tạo ra. Chuyến phiêu lưu của anh chàng nguyền cụ sư chính thức bắt đầu.
description.pt-br:
A versão mangá de um dos romances de fantasia isekai mais populares de Shousetsuka ni Narou!

Gaile, um Cursificer, fica sem um tostão quando é expulso de seu grupo assim que chegam ao Rank S. Aparentemente ele não estava contribuindo o suficiente?! Mas eles não tinham percebido que seus itens amaldiçoados superam até mesmo relíquias sagradas e equipamentos lendários!

Gaile decide tentar ganhar a vida por conta própria com seus itens amaldiçoados.

altTitles.ja: ちょっとだけ抜けちゃう柊さん
Hiiragi-san is a little careless.

description.en: Kotori-kun, who falls in love with his classmate Hiiragi-san at first sight, somehow wants to get close to her. Hiiragi-san is quite an earnest and lovely girl, but… She’s surprisingly a little careless--! This is about the charming school life of a careless girl and a pure boy who gets led on everyday by her -- a romantic comedy that’s a wee bit H sometimes but warm and fluffy to death.

altTitles.ja: 機動絶記ガンダム SEQUEL

altTitles.vi: Cơ Động Tuyệt Kí Gundam Sequel

description.en: It has been 700 years since a certain "war" in which more than half of the human race lost their lives. The Gundam, which had protected the Earth during the Great War, was no longer necessary for humankind. In such a peaceful world, there was a woman called "Bloody Kaoris". This is a story of betrayal over the lost "God" named "Gundam".

Gamin Yoon, a 17 year old student, goes to a school known to harbor future criminals. Stuck in a carnivorous environment where only the strongest survive, he struggles to get good grades to enter a 4 year university. But, will he be able to study well enough to enter university, or will he get involved in the unending fights around the school?  


---

[Official Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/CAMPUS/pizixueba/list?title_no=1467)

altTitles.ja: 無限のスキルゲッター！

description.en:
During a Once-in-A-lifetime ceremony, the young boy, Yuri, receives the trash skill “Life transfer”, allowing him to transfer his life force to another person…
Crushed by despair after receiving the skill, Yuri encounters a woman who loses her life right in front of him. Wanting to be the one to decide who he gives his life to, he activates “Life Transfer”, dying on the spot. It had appeared as though the woman’s life was ended rather abruptly, however, the woman turned out to be the daughter of god. As a “thank you” for saving the life of his daughter, god resurrected Yuri, and in addition, gave him the ability to receive double the experience points each month.
With the endless amount of experience he gains, Yuri will leisurely walk the path to the world’s strongest, collecting endless amounts of skills along the way!
***
[Orignal webnovel](https://www.alphapolis.co.jp/novel/587737999/279349914)

altTitles.ja: リィンカーネーションの花弁

description.en: Striving for talent, Senji Touya tries everything he can so he can find it. Kendou, dancing, swimming, basketball, soccer, chess… anything he tries, he fails to exceed it. One day, his classmate, Haito, came to school for once in a long time. Senji refers to her as someone who "has it" or someone who has talent. Later on, he found out that she isn't just someone who has talent, but someone who "took" the talent of herself in her past life. And, those who "took" the talent from their past lives, are also known as "Returners"…
description.vi: Cố gắng tìm kiếm tài năng, Senji Touya thử mọi thứ có thể để tìm ra nó. Kiếm đạo, nhảy múa, bơi lội, bóng rổ, bóng đá, cờ vua… bất cứ thứ gì cậu thử, cậu đều không thể vượt trội. Một ngày nọ, cô bạn cùng lớp của cậu, Haito, tới trường sau một thời gian dài vắng mặt. Senji coi cô là người "có nó" – một người có tài năng. Sau đó, cậu phát hiện ra rằng cô không chỉ là một người có tài năng mà còn là người đã "lấy" tài năng của mình từ kiếp trước. Và, những người "lấy" tài năng từ kiếp trước của họ còn được gọi là "Những Kẻ Trở Lại"…
description.pt-br: Na busca por um talento só seu, Senji Touya tenta de tudo para encontrá-lo. Kendou, dança, natação, basquete, futebol, xadrez… em tudo o que ele tenta, ele não consegue se destacar. Um dia, sua colega de classe, Haito, vem à escola pela primeira vez em muito tempo. Senji se refere a ela como alguém que “possui algo” ou alguém que tem um verdadeiro talento. Mais tarde, ele descobriu que ela não é apenas alguém que tem talento, mas alguém que “conseguiu” o talento de si mesma através de sua vida passada. E, aqueles que “conseguem” o talento de suas vidas passadas, também são conhecidos como “Reencarnados” …

altTitles.en: I Want to be Teased by a Cute Junior

altTitles.zh-hk: 可愛後輩想讓我說出口

description.en: Yasu likes his kouhai, Moriyama, who is at the same time extremely assertive, deadpan, and extremely passive aggressive.
description.ja: まったく素直じゃない後輩・守山ちゃんは、自分にアプローチさせようと野洲先輩を挑発したり、時には大胆にアクションしたり…!?
description.pt-br: Yasu gosta da sua kouhai, Moriyama, que é ao mesmo tempo extremamente assertiva, inexpressiva e extremamente passiva-agressiva.

altTitles.ja-ro: Tome wa Hane! Suzusato Koukou Shodoubu

altTitles.ja: とめはねっ!
とめはねっ! 鈴里高校書道部
とめはねっ！−鈴里高校書道部−

description.en:
Tales of a high-school calligraphy club.  
  
A story about a high-school calligraphy club on the verge of breaking up that enters in a major competition while overcoming problems. Yuki, a promising female judoist, and Yukari, a quiet Canadian-raised boy who just returned to Japan, end up joining the club for the sake of maintaining the membership required to keep the club. Together with the old club members with unique characters, they gradually discover the fun of calligraphy and work together to win in the competition.  
  
Tomehane! was nominated for best manga at the first two Manga Taisho.

Live action series adaptation (2010): [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/742-tomehane)
